title: John Deere 's total assets 2013 to 2019
yAxis: Total assets in million U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Total assets in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 7 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2015.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2015 to 2013.
gold: This statistic represents John Deere 's ( Deere & Company 's ) total assets from 2013 through 2019 . In 2014 , the Fortune Global 500 company held total assets to the value of approximately 61.3 billion U.S. dollars .
